text.section:
If an applicant qualifies for a license under this subtitle, the Board shall send the applicant a notice that states that:
the applicant has qualified for a license; and
the Board will issue a license to the applicant on receipt of the appropriate license fee required under § 6.5-207 of this title.
On payment of the license fee, the Board shall issue a license to each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

The Board shall include on each license that the Board issues:
the full name of the licensee;
the license grade level; and
the registration number assigned by the Board to the licensee.
